titles: A vindication of the Unitarians, against a late reverend author on the Trinity
author: Freke, William, 1662-1744.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
On the question of allegiance to William and Mary and on the doctrine of the Trinity, 1689-1693.
Attributed to William Freke.  Cf. Herbert McLachlan in his The story of a nonconformist library. 1923. p. 64.
keywords: Unitarians --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  William and Mary, 1689-1702.
